deficit.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the difference between the amount of something that you have and the higher amount that you need

deficit.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an amount of money that a business has lost in a particular period of time

deficit.translation[1].definitions[1].de: an amount by which the money that a government spends is more than it receives in tax in a particular period
